column1: 1409562128 5404361e0d0cee5cefbd6fff 2191406 2791621 0 Write2pri https://www.zomato.com/users/write2pri-2191406 "A very interesting place to hangout with friends.Good music and decent food.We enjoyed the Nachos and the baked potatoes.The only veg salad was a let down...the lettuce was not crisp and the dressing did not generate excitement.The Go Veg burger was nice and soft.The Dessert which was complimentary was Devine!Complimentary because they delayed in bringing the order.A very lovely gesture I must say....Very nice staff and wonderful ambience.....reminded me of Louvre in Paris:)" 305461 "2014-08-31 20:11:30" 5 "Very Good" https://www.zomato.com/review/DNLodq  1409496090.0

( a welcome change from all the other enclosed

column1: 1409562128 5404361e0d0cee5cefbd7005 349648 2733261 1089 "R@je$h : ""Monday Bl..." https://www.zomato.com/rajeshbakhshi "Monkey Bar - Vasant Kunj (New Delhi)You don't have to go to a pub in New York City or Singapore as this place is mind dazzling. 'Gastro Pub' -  a bar and restaurant serving high-end beer and food. Located adjacent to the Mini Cooper Showroom in Vasant Kunj
column2: this place is structured in an amazing and exotic design with glass shelters in a pyramid shape. Transforming from the Punjabi 'theka' culture to western culture of pubs and food
column3: Monkey Bar is a vicious circle of the pub world with enhanced quality of creativity and style for the Indian pub lovers.The similar pub chain operates in Bangalore also....Oops - Bengaluru !! The timings of this pub are from 12 noon to 1 am. Fair and square as children can find access only till 6 pm and beyond which time is meant for the grown-ups only. There was a time in 1990's when big parties were only a few with loud music - food and wine. Nowadays
column4: all you got to do is hit a pub like this and its party time.Glad to...read more" 305461 "2014-08-29 22:54:55" 314  https://www.zomato.com/review/pevMBv 9 1409333095.0

column1: 1409562137 5404362b0d0cee5cefbd7148 10140 720520 8 "Dhruv Chopra" https://www.zomato.com/users/dhruv-chopra-10140 "After a lot of huha about this place and seeing it as the most trending eatery in Delhi I decided to head out to this place with a predisposition to not like it. But I'm happy to say that the place got me floored!!! Ambience is one aspect which is usually compromised by a restaurant for the sake of maximising floor space.. It is not the case here and I was pleasantly surprised.. The path leading upto the entry lets u take in the entirety of the structure which is breathtaking and one would presume he is entering a model of the Louvre but only this is a restaurant. Once inside u see through walls ;) and at night u see the reflection of your table in the pyramidical glass ceiling.Monkey Bar houses a pool table and a fooseball table which can be played on the house (while u wait for the table) .Coming to the most important part.. FoodWe tried a lot of things from the butterfly chicken

Monkey Bar is indeed one of them. Located in not-so noisy areas of Vasant Kunj (Just opposite DPS) this tiny pyramid is a jem of a place. I knew I would love this place as soon as I passed the quiet and neatly trimmed lawns and entered the transparent glass building full of people holding mugs of beer and evidently having a nice time.The place is spread across three floors the architecture is very interesting. First is the lower ground floor with a more cosy and private seating arrangement followed by the ground floor has a bar and then are a flight of stairs that take you to the first floor

column3: it's a MoBar specialty. Must try it once... May not suit everyone taste.Naraangi: a whisky based drink. Again a MoBar specialty. Must try!Goan chorizo pao: loved it...
